translations.kolacici: www.opac.bisis.rs uses personal and third-party cookies to improve your website browsing experience and provide services in accordance with your wishes. If you agree to the use of cookies, please mark "I accept" below. {$START_TAG_BUTTON}Prihvatam{$CLOSE_TAG_BUTTON}
translations.greskaOcenaKnjigePrijava: You must be logged in to rate a book!
translations.greskaOcenaKnjige: An error occurred while rating the book!
translations.nemaDostupnihPrimeraka: There are no copies available for this book
translations.uspesnoSteRezervisali: You have successfully reserved a book! You can pick up the book within 3 days from the moment you receive the e-mail that the book is available.
translations.daLiZeliteDaRezervisete: Do you want to reserve a book?
translations.bibliotekaNePodrzavaFunkcionalnost: The library does not support this functionality!
translations.serverskaGreskaPriPokusajuRezervacije: Server error while reserving a book!
translations.nijeMoguceMenjatiSliku: It is not possible to change the image or description of the book
translations.nijeUnetOpisKnjige: Description of the book not entered
translations.klikniIliPrevuci: Click or drag the image file
translations.fajlNeSmeBitiVeci: The file cannot be larger than 6MB.
translations.nisteIzvrsiliNikakvePromene: You have not made any changes!
translations.uspesnoAzuriraniPodaciOKnjizi: You have successfully updated data about the book!
translations.nijeMoguceMenjatiOpis: It is not possible to change the description and cover image of the book!
translations.greskaDodavanjeNaPolicu: Error adding book to the bookshelf!
translations.greskaKnjigaNaPolici: This book is already on your bookshelf.
translations.greskaBrisanjeSaPolice: Error deleting book from the bookshelf!
translations.greskaSklanjanjeSaPolice: Error removing book from the bookshelf!
translations.knjigaSklonjenaSaPolice: The book removed from the shelf
translations.internalServerErrorPage: A server error has occurred...{$LINE_BREAK} Design in progress
translations.notFoundPage: Path not found...{$LINE_BREAK} Design in progress...
translations.pretragaSadrzaj: With this universal search, you get all the results based on the entered text. When entering text, you can also select terms that will be automatically offered to you in the drop-down menu. You can further narrow down the results using the filter on the left.
translations.naprednaPretragaSadrzaj: By selecting more search parameters, you get more precise results.
translations.prijavaSadrzaj: Create your BISIS user profile and use a variety of online services: access to your loans and return deadlines, the possibility to renew your loans and extend the deadlines, access to the list of books you have read so far, access to your membership fee expiration date, rating of the books you have read…
translations.uzajamniKatalogSadrzaj: Using the union catalogue, you can simultaneously search the catalogues of all libraries that use the BISIS system.
translations.greskaLinkNevazeci: The link is invalid, you have been redirected to the homepage.
translations.kopirajteLink: Copy the link to share the selected records
translations.linkZaDeljenjeSmesten: The share link is placed in the clipboard
translations.nemaRezultataZaZadateParametre: No results for the search parameters!
translations.knjigaPostojiUKolekciji: The book already exists in the selected collection!
translations.nijeUspeloDodavanjeUKolekciju: Failed to add book to collection!
translations.uspesnoSteDodaliUKolekciju: You have successfully added a book to the collection!
translations.nemateNiJednuKnjiguUKolekciji: You do not have any books in the selected collection.{$LINE_BREAK} Add books from the search to the collection so you can edit it!
translations.daLiSteSigurniZaBrisanjeKolekcije: Are you sure you want to delete the collection: {$INTERPOLATION} ?
translations.uspesnoStePromeniliKolokciju: You have successfully changed the collection!
translations.uspesnoStePromeniliLozinku: You have successfully changed your account password, you can login!
translations.uspesnoSteAktiviraliNalog: You have successfully activated your OPAC account, you can log in!
translations.lozinkaKriterijum: Please enter preferred password, which will meet the criteria: 6 characters, at least one capital letter and one number!

translations.rokZaPodizanjeKnjige: Deadline for pick up the book: {$INTERPOLATION}

translations.unesiteImeKolekcije: Enter a unique name for the new collection!
translations.greskaKolekcijaSaIstimNazivom:
The maximum number of collections is 15, and the maximum number of books in a collection is 30. 
You cannot create multiple collections with the same title!
translations.uspesnoKreiranaKolekcija: You have successfully created a collection: {$PH}
translations.greskaNazivKolekcijeJeJedinstven:
The maximum number of collections is 15, and the maximum number of books in a collection is 30. 
You cannot create multiple collections with the same title!

translations.greskaDodavanjeBiblioteke: An error occurred while adding a new library. Try again

translations.zaImenuLicnihPodataka: To change personal data, you need to contact your library.
translations.registracija2: Become a registered member of BISIS and use the following benefits and online services
translations.registracija3: Access to currently borrowed books and return deadlines.{$LINE_BREAK} The possibility to extend the deadline for borrowed books online.{$LINE_BREAK} The membership fee expiration date.{$LINE_BREAK} Access to the list of books you have read so far.{$LINE_BREAK} The possibility of rating books you have read.{$LINE_BREAK} The ability to create a personal online library - a virtual bookshelf with your favorite books that you have read or want to read.{$LINE_BREAK} The ability to reserve books online.{$LINE_BREAK} Watching movies through the AVA platform {$START_LINK}https://bgb.ava.watch{$CLOSE_LINK}{$LINE_BREAK}
translations.registracija5: By email: {$LINE_BREAK} Send a registration request to the email address {$START_LINK}pult@bgb.rs{$CLOSE_LINK}. The title of the email should be Request to open a BISIS user account. In the e-mail, state your first and last name and membership card number. {$LINE_BREAK} An activation link will be sent to your email. By clicking on the link, you will start the registration process.
translations.registracija6: Directly in the library:{$LINE_BREAK} When you come to the library, ask the librarian to send you a link for registration to your email address.{$LINE_BREAK} An activation link will be sent to your email. By clicking on the link, you will start the registration process.{$LINE_BREAK} Enjoy the possibilities offered by the BISIS catalog!
translations.registracija7: Become a registered member of BISIS and use the following benefits and online services
translations.registracija8: Access to currently borrowed books and return deadlines.{$LINE_BREAK} The possibility to extend the deadline for borrowed books online.{$LINE_BREAK} The membership fee expiration date.{$LINE_BREAK} Access to the list of books you have read so far.{$LINE_BREAK} The possibility of rating books you have read.{$LINE_BREAK} The ability to create a personal online library - a virtual bookshelf with your favorite books that you have read or want to read.{$LINE_BREAK} The ability to reserve books online.{$LINE_BREAK}
translations.registracija10: When you come to the library, ask the librarian to send you a registration link to your email address. {$LINE_BREAK} An activation link will be sent to your email. By clicking on the link, you will start the registration process.{$LINE_BREAK} Enjoy the possibilities offered by the BISIS catalog!
